original_text: And the officers shall speak further to the people, and say, ‘Is there any man who is fearful and fainthearted? Let him go back to his house, lest he make the heart of his fellows melt like his own.’
korean_text: 책임자들은 또 백성에게 말하여 이르기를 두려워서 마음이 허약한 자가 있느냐 그는 집으로 돌아갈지니 그의 형제들의 마음도 그의 마음과 같이 낙심될까 하노라 하고

sentences.original_text: And the officers shall speak further to the people
‘Is there any man who is fearful and fainthearted?
Let him go back to his house,
lest he make the heart of his fellows melt
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 동료들의 마음을 녹게 할까 하여
